mapper.select: select instr_no,dt,r1,r2,r3 from ( select *, row_number() OVER(partition by CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), DT ,23 ),INSTR_NO order by DT desc) rowNum from [LCRiver_xwdh_2].[dbo].${tableName} where INSTR_NO = '${id}' and ${type} is not null and DT between '${startTime}' and '${endTime}' )t where t.rowNum = 1

select * from [LCRiver_xwdh_2].[dbo].${tableName} where rtrim(instr_no) = '${instr_no}'
and dt between '${startTime}' and '${endTime}'
order by dt desc
select count(*) from [LCRiver_xwdh_2].[dbo].${tableName}_AUTO where INSTR_NO = #{id} and Component = #{type} is not null and DT = #{DT}
